item.title: Need help with my minigame
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

ok, at the end of my minigame when u use the key on the chest u get a reward… but i want to make it so that when u get the reward it also teles you to a differnt location. here is the part of the code i have … maybe i add it to this?

if (useItemID == 6104 && atObjectID == 5162) { deleteItem(6104, getItemSlot(6104), 1); addItem(962, 1); addItem(995, 500000); sendMessage("Gratz, your pretty 1337"); }
